name: Sprigguns Pede
text: You can Tribute this card, then target 1 "Sprigguns" monster in your GY, except "Sprigguns Pede"; Special Summon it. If this card is in your hand, field, or GY: You can target 1 "Sprigguns" Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. You can only use each effect of "Sprigguns Pede" once per turn.
